title: How to Draw a Preppy Female

steps.headline: Draw a wide oval shape as the head.
steps.description: Don't make it too wide, or too thin.

steps.headline: Right below the head, in the middle, put down a thin oval for the body.
steps.description: Again, not too wide or too thin, or it will end up looking bad.

steps.headline: Put two very thin ovals on each side of the body for the legs.
steps.description: Don't make it too wide, but don't make it too thin, again, or we won't be able to draw any accessories!

steps.headline: Put two more very thin ovals just below the head.
steps.description: Again, not too wide or too thin, but don't put it too close to the head, either!

steps.headline: Add some detail.
steps.description: In the middle of the face, just below the oval-curve, draw two circles for the eyes and put two small dots in them for the pupils.

steps.headline: Draw the female's hair.
steps.description: Try drawing it in this order: line, then the outline of the line. Line, outline. You can choose your own way, though.

steps.headline: Draw her shoes.
steps.description: It is recommended to have an oval pointing out on each side, but you can decide.

steps.headline: Add decorations.
steps.description: Decorate the shoes, body, (if your female is wearing clothes) arms, and legs (again, if your female is wearing clothes).

tyn: An eraser, in case you make a mistake.
text: Draw a wide oval shape as the head. Don't make it too wide, or too thin. Right below the head, in the middle, put down a thin oval for the body. Again, not too wide or too thin, or it will end up looking bad. Put two very thin ovals on each side of the body for the legs. Don't make it too wide, but don't make it too thin, again, or we won't be able to draw any accessories! Put two more very thin ovals just below the head. Again, not too wide or too thin, but don't put it too close to the head, either! Add some detail. In the middle of the face, just below the oval-curve, draw two circles for the eyes and put two small dots in them for the pupils. Draw the female's hair. Try drawing it in this order: line, then the outline of the line. Line, outline. You can choose your own way, though. Draw her shoes. It is recommended to have an oval pointing out on each side, but you can decide. Add decorations. Decorate the shoes, body, (if your female is wearing clothes) arms, and legs (again, if your female is wearing clothes). Finished.
sentences: Draw a wide oval shape as the head.
Don't make it too wide, or too thin.
Right below the head, in the middle, put down a thin oval for the body.
Again, not too wide or too thin, or it will end up looking bad.
Put two very thin ovals on each side of the body for the legs.
Don't make it too wide, but don't make it too thin, again, or we won't be able to draw any accessories!
Put two more very thin ovals just below the head.
Again, not too wide or too thin, but don't put it too close to the head, either!
In the middle of the face, just below the oval-curve, draw two circles for the eyes and put two small dots in them for the pupils.
Try drawing it in this order: line, then the outline of the line.
You can choose your own way, though.
It is recommended to have an oval pointing out on each side, but you can decide.
Decorate the shoes, body, (if your female is wearing clothes) arms, and legs (again, if your female is wearing clothes).
